title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for chatting with Ollama models via a simple async/sync client.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you swap Ollama models into any chain or agent.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing synchronous, reactive and Kotlin-coroutine APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for integrating local Ollama models into Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI that wraps Ollama with prompt templating, conversation history and shell piping.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like pair programmer.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration for retrieval pipelines using Ollama chat & embedding models.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for deploying Ollama with Docker, Kubernetes, GPU scheduling, CI, etc.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All chat UI that can also connect to an Ollama backend for local model management.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for running Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and GPU nodes.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language wrapper for Ollama REST API with async HTTP and native JSON handling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain to chat with your documents.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model using slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama completions and embeddings into channels and workflows.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted writing and note Q&A powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-on-term
summary: Terminal UI (TUI) client for Ollama written in Go with vim keys and conversation buffer.
